title: special custom remotes should redirect all possible stdout into logging, and not let it leak into annex's
body:
I bet it is me who is doing something wrong but I don't see it:
- I do reply `TRANSFER-SUCCESS RETRIEVE keyfile` but annex still reports that copy is not available from my remote

```
drop test2.dat ok
(recording state in git...)
get test2.dat (from annexed-archives...)
```
